column1: Mamma shook her head; though she could not help laughing at the little girl's mistake
column2: for she meant subscribers. It is a hard word; but this little Mamie knew the meaning well."O mamma! please do; for you know I love it. And Jennie and Katie and Bessie will love it too
column3: if they only know about it; and
column6: if I send some new names to 'The Nursery' man."Little Mamie was so urgent in her request
column7: that her mother asked papa what he thought about it.Papa said
column9: let her try if she wants to: it will do no harm." How the black eyes danced! and the little feet could hardly keep still
column10: while mamma dressed her up very warmly
column11: till she was just about as large one way as the other.
